name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place sugar cube in rocks glass, saturate with bitters and a few dashes of water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: Manhattan
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with half an orange slice.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: If using egg white, dry shake all ingredients first. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with half an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Gimlet
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Vodka Soda
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add vodka, top with club soda. Squeeze lime wedge and drop in. Stir gently.

name: Rusty Nail
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Bee's Knees
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Sidecar
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe with a sugared rim (optional). Garnish with an orange twist.

name: French 75
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
instructions: Rinse a chilled coupe with absinthe and discard excess. Shake remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Last Word
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish needed.

name: Southside
instructions: Gently muddle mint with simple syrup. Add gin and lime juice. Shake with ice until well-chilled. Fine strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Clover Club
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients without ice. Then shake with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Build all ingredients in a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Hugo
instructions: Add mint and elderflower liqueur to a wine glass. Fill with ice. Add prosecco and club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.

name: Paloma
instructions: Add tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and a pinch of salt to a highball glass with ice. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

name: Tommy's Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over ice.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Pornstar Martini
instructions: Shake vodka, Passoa, passion fruit puree, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a coupe. Float half a passion fruit on top. Serve with a shot of prosecco on the side.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime zest.

name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water. Fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum, fill with soda water. Light stir. Garnish with mint sprigs.

name: Spritz Veneziano
instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add Select, prosecco, and club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a green olive.

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

name: Bijou
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Aviation
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients except soda for 1 minute. Add ice and shake vigorously for another minute. Strain into a Collins glass. Let settle, then slowly pour soda down the middle to lift the foam.

name: Champs-Élysées
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: White Lady
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: El Presidente
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

name: Mary Pickford
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Hotel Nacional Special
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Papa Doble
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. A stronger, less sweet daiquiri variation.

name: Margarita
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or serve in a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with half a lime slice.

name: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add tequila and orange juice, stir. Slowly pour grenadine down the side of the glass to settle at bottom. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Matador
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Mexican Firing Squad
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Charro Negro
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add tequila and lime juice. Top with cola. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Godfather
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.

name: Stinger
instructions: Stir ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Can also be served over crushed ice.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Black Russian
instructions: Pour ingredients into a rocks glass over ice. Stir briefly.

name: Irish Coffee
instructions: Warm the glass. Add whiskey and sugar, stir to dissolve. Add hot coffee. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon. Do not stir after adding cream.

name: Vesper Martini
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice until very cold. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a large, thin lemon peel.

name: Vodka Martini
instructions: Stir (or shake) ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olives.

name: Americano
instructions: Build Campari and sweet vermouth in a highball glass over ice. Top with club soda. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with pineapple spear, mint sprig, and lime peel.

name: Zombie
instructions: Shake all ingredients except dark rum with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with crushed ice. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with mint and a cherry.

name: Jungle Bird
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Painkiller
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg and an orange slice.

name: Navy Grog
instructions: Shake all ingredients except soda with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with crushed ice. Top with soda. Garnish with a lime wheel and mint.

name: Scorpion
instructions: Blend all ingredients with crushed ice. Pour into a scorpion bowl or large snifter. Garnish with gardenia flowers or orchids. Traditionally serves 2.

name: Blue Hawaii
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a hurricane glass with ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Planter's Punch
instructions: Shake all ingredients except soda with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with soda. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

name: Singapore Sling
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Paper Plane
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish needed.

name: Naked & Famous
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. No garnish needed.

name: Gold Rush
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Penicillin
instructions: Shake blended scotch, lemon, and honey-ginger syrup with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Float Islay scotch on top. Garnish with candied ginger.

name: Vieux Carré
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Sazerac
instructions: Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe and discard excess. In a mixing glass, muddle sugar with bitters and a splash of water. Add rye and ice, stir until well-chilled. Strain into the prepared glass. Express a lemon peel over the drink and discard.

name: Martinez
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Toronto
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Gently muddle mint with simple syrup in a julep cup. Add bourbon and pack with crushed ice. Stir until cup is frosted. Top with more crushed ice. Garnish with a generous mint bouquet.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add lime juice, then ginger beer. Float dark rum on top by pouring over the back of a spoon. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Moscow Mule
instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a copper mug filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice.

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients without ice. Then shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Dash bitters on top in a decorative pattern.

name: Alexander
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Between the Sheets
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Brandy Crusta
instructions: Sugar rim a small coupe with a long lemon peel spiral inside. Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into the prepared glass.

name: Casino
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist and cherry.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into a highball glass. Top with soda. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange zest.

name: John Collins
instructions: Build gin, lemon juice, and syrup in a Collins glass with ice. Top with soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon slice and cherry.

name: Monkey Gland
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Paradise
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Porto Flip
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Tuxedo
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a cherry and lemon zest.

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into a chilled flute. Top with prosecco. Stir gently.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Roll (pour back and forth) all ingredients with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with celery stalk and lemon wedge.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Cut lime into wedges, place in glass with sugar. Muddle to release juice. Add cachaca and crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place sugar cube in flute, saturate with bitters. Add cognac. Top with champagne. Garnish with orange zest and cherry.

name: Cuba Libre
instructions: Build rum and lime juice in a highball glass with ice. Top with cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: French Connection
instructions: Build ingredients in a rocks glass over ice. Stir gently.

name: Golden Dream
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions: Build vodka and orange juice in a highball glass with ice. Stir. Float Galliano on top.

name: Horse's Neck
instructions: Build in a highball glass with ice. Place a long spiral of lemon peel inside the glass.

name: Kir
instructions: Pour creme de cassis into a wine glass. Top with white wine. Stir gently.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Shake all ingredients except cola with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Top with cola. Garnish with a lemon spiral.

name: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into a chilled flute. Top with champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Piña Colada
instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Sea Breeze
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Sex on the Beach
instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Barracuda
instructions: Shake rum, Galliano, pineapple juice, and lime with ice. Strain into a coupe. Top with prosecco.

name: Bramble
instructions: Shake gin, lemon, and syrup with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Drizzle creme de mure over top. Garnish with blackberries and a lemon slice.

name: Canchanchara
instructions: Mix honey with a splash of water to dissolve. Add aguardiente and lime juice. Stir with ice. Serve in a rocks glass or traditional clay cup.

name: Fernandito
instructions: Build Fernet Branca in a highball glass with ice. Top with cola. Stir gently.

name: French Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Illegal
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a sugar-rimmed coupe. Garnish with a lemon zest.

name: New York Sour
instructions: Dry shake bourbon, lemon, syrup, and egg white. Shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Float red wine on top.

name: Old Cuban
instructions: Muddle mint with syrup. Add rum, lime, and bitters. Shake with ice. Strain into a coupe. Top with champagne. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Russian Spring Punch
instructions: Shake vodka, cassis, lemon, and syrup with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon slice and blackberries.

name: Spicy Fifty
instructions: Muddle chili with honey. Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice. Fine strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a chili.

name: Suffering Bastard
instructions: Shake gin, cognac, lime, and bitters with ice. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with mint and orange slice.

name: Trinidad Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: VE.N.TO
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients. Shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass with ice.

name: Yellow Bird
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Whiskey Smash
instructions: Muddle lemon and mint with syrup. Add bourbon and ice. Shake briefly. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Self Starter
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express a lemon peel over the drink.
notes: Invented at Tina's in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

name: Division Bell
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Mezcal–Gin White Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass. Express a lemon peel over the drink.

name: Banana Cynar Rye
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain over a large cube. Express an orange peel if desired.

name: Canadian Rye & Cynar
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an amarena cherry.

name: Banana Coffee Colada
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain over crushed ice or blend briefly for a frozen version.

name: Medicina Latina
instructions: Shake everything except mezcal with ice. Strain over a large cube. Carefully float mezcal on top. Garnish with candied ginger.

name: Last Fortress
instructions: Rinse a chilled glass with aguardiente. Stir remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Chimp on Fire
instructions: Stir or shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a rocks glass.
notes: Smoke, coffee, caramelized banana, tropical bitterness.

name: China Noir
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled glass or bottle and chill. Serve cold.
notes: Dark amaro glow, orange-peel bitterness, soft smoke. Not citrusy, not sweet—just deep. (Amaro CioCiaro can be used for more bite.)

name: Sunset Park
instructions: Add all ingredients to a chilled mixing glass. Add cracked ice and stir for 25–30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
notes: A lighter, summery Manhattan. Inspired by "Frank's Special."

name: Washington Apple
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

name: The Royal Sovereign
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain over a large ice cube in a rocks glass.

name: Brandy Fernet Nightcap
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass (or serve over a large cube in a rocks glass).
notes: Herbal Manhattan-adjacent, warm, bitter-edged, slow-sip closer.

name: The Grapefruit Moon
instructions: Rinse a chilled coupe with absinthe. Shake remaining ingredients with ice. Fine strain into the prepared coupe. Express a lemon peel over the drink.

name: Rouge Claire Negroni
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a tumbler with fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist or coin.
notes: Rosé vermouth (e.g., Cocchi Rosa). Alternative: 1/3 oz red vermouth + 1/3 oz white vermouth.

name: Salmoncito
instructions: Build gin, Campari, and grapefruit juice in an ice-filled highball glass. Top with tonic water. Garnish with a supremed grapefruit wedge; express grapefruit peel and discard.

name: Snake Eyes
instructions: Salt the rim of a large rocks glass. Shake all ingredients with ice. Fine strain over ice in the prepared glass.
notes: Preferably Espadín mezcal.

name: Clandestine
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain over ice in a rocks glass or serve up.
notes: Gentian liqueur (Suze or Salers). Bergamot liqueur (Italicus). Honey syrup (3:1 honey:water). Created by Simon Difford, 2017.

name: Italicus Spritz
instructions: Build all ingredients except prosecco over ice. Top with prosecco. Stir gently.
notes: Bergamot liqueur (Italicus).

name: Negroni Bianco Bergamotto
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass.
notes: Bergamot liqueur (Italicus).

name: Bay Leaf Daiquiri

ingredients.name: lime juice blend (1:3 key lime : Persian lime)

instructions: Add bay leaves to a shaker. Pour a small amount of liquid nitrogen into the shaker and muddle the herbs. Add remaining ingredients and shake. Fine-strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

name: Rosie Martini
instructions: Add gin, dry vermouth, and gentian amaro to a mixing glass with ice and stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a glass, then add onion brine and gently stir to incorporate. Express a lemon twist over the glass and discard it, then garnish with a cocktail onion.
notes: Cocktail Onions: Simmer peeled pearl onions with water, vinegar, salt, sugar, and chile powder, then chill and store in the fridge.

name: Margarita & Cream
instructions: Add ice cream, tequila, and lime juice to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a small glass and top with salted whipped cream. Serve with a spoon.
notes: Strawberry-Rhubarb Ice Cream: Cook strawberry puree and sugar with frozen rhubarb sous vide at 70°C for 2 hr, blend, freeze in trays overnight. Salted Whipped Cream: Beat heavy cream with salt until firm peaks form.

name: Tomate o Tomaté
instructions: Rim a highball glass with za'atar salt. Add all ingredients except the soda to a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into the prepared glass over ice and top with soda water.
notes: Tomato-Infused Mezcal: Blend four plum tomatoes with a 750 ml bottle of mezcal. Bell Pepper Cordial: Mix 8 oz bell pepper juice with ¼ cup sugar and 1 tsp citric acid; chill. Za'atar Salt: Combine equal parts za'atar and salt.

name: Real Charmer's Daiquiri
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and hard shake. Double-strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
notes: Coconut Syrup: Blend equal parts coconut cream and simple syrup with an immersion blender; refrigerate.

name: Salad Bar Martini
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir to chill. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry tomato.
notes: Tomato Water: Quarter tomatoes, weigh them, and add salt at about 1% of the tomato weight. Blend until smooth, then strain repeatedly through a fine mesh until the liquid runs clear.

name: Archie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake well. Strain over ice into a glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
notes: Beet Mezcal: Cook one small red beet in ~½ inch of water at 375°F (190°C) for ~30 minutes; cool, blend with 750 ml mezcal, strain, and add ~375 ml grapefruit juice (oro blanco or similar). Store chilled.

name: Nashi Highball
instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to a glass and stir to combine. Top with soda water. Garnish with a fresh bay leaf.
notes: Pickled Ginger Syrup: Blend sugar, water, and pickled sushi ginger; strain and refrigerate.

name: Blanka
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. 'Throw' three times (shake with a bit of flair). Strain over a large ice cube in a rocks glass.
notes: Apple Celery Shrub: 150 ml Granny Smith apple juice, 150 ml celery juice, 20 ml ginger juice, 25 ml vodka, 175 ml simple syrup (6:4 sugar:water), pinches of citric, ascorbic, and malic acids. Juice apples, celery, and ginger; mix with vodka, simple syrup, and acids. Chill 4-5 days.

name: Ni De Aqui Ni De Alla
instructions: Line a rocks glass with a banana leaf. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain over a large ice cube into the prepared glass.
notes: Plantain Syrup: 1 cup water, 1 cup light brown sugar, ½ cup sliced ripe plantains. Combine water and sugar; heat until sugar dissolves. At ~180°F, add plantains and simmer 7-10 minutes. Remove from heat, steep 10 minutes, strain, and chill. Keeps up to a week.

name: Frozen Mexican Martini
instructions: Prepare a stemmed glass with a half salt rim (optional). Combine all ingredients except olive brine in a blender with ice. Blend on low for ~5 seconds, then high for ~10 seconds. Pour into the prepared glass. Float olive brine on top. Garnish with a straw and olives.

name: Tropical Itch
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with crushed ice. Shake and dump into a Hurricane glass. Position a banana leaf in the glass and top with crushed ice. Garnish with a straw, pineapple wedge and a back scratcher.

name: Star Daisy
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake hard with ice until very cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gin Fizz Tropical
instructions: Add gin, lime juice, orgeat, pineapple gum syrup and egg white to a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a fizz glass or a small rocks glass. Top with soda water. Garnish with lime wheel and mint.

name: Wibble
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Puritan
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a Martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Alaska
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake until chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Yellow
instructions: Combine the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double-strain into a chilled coupe or cocktail glass. Express the lemon twists over the surface of the drink and discard.

name: Yolanda

ingredients.name: rose- and apple-infused Pineaus de Charentes

instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice, and stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe or Nick and Nora glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
notes: Rose- and Apple-Infused Pineau de Charentes: For every 8 ounces of Pineau de Charentes, add six small dried rose buds and 3.5 grams of dried apple. Allow it to macerate for 48 hours then double-strain using a tea strainer.

name: Two Dylans
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and muddle. Fill tin with cubed ice and hard-shake for 8 to 10 seconds. Double-strain over cubed ice (or one large cube) into a chilled double rocks glass. Garnish with a curry leaf.
notes: Macadamia Nut Orgeat: 500 grams coconut water, 150 grams raw macadamia nuts, 4 grams kosher salt, white granulated sugar. Combine coconut water, raw macadamia nuts and salt into a blender, pulse three times. Strain, add sugar equal to weight of liquid. Refrigerate up to 2 weeks.

name: Ward Eight
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe.
notes: Acid-Adjusted Orange Juice: 500 grams orange juice, 16 grams citric acid, 10 grams malic acid. Beet Shrub Grenadine: Combine two parts beet shrub with one part grenadine.

name: Alpine Negroni
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a liter bottle. Store in the freezer. When ready to serve, pour into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist.
notes: Champagne Acid: 3 grams lactic acid, 3 grams tartaric acid, 94 grams water. Add all ingredients into a resealable container and shake until dissolved.

name: Kingston Negroni
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until chilled. Strain over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a long, trimmed orange peel.
